LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipHasTitle: {PAWN_labelShort} currently has the title {TITLE}, awarded by {FACTION_name}.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipConceited: {PAWN_labelShort} will demand that this title's privileges be fully respected.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipNonConceited: {PAWN_labelShort} is flexible about this title's privileges.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipFinalTitle: No more earnable titles on this planet.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipInheritance: If {PAWN_nameDef} dies, {HEIR_nameFull} is designated to inherit {PAWN_possessive} title.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipHeirNoFaction: {HEIR_nameFull} is not a member of any faction.
LanguageData.RoyalTitleTooltipNoHeir: No one is designated to inherit {PAWN_nameDef}'s title. If {PAWN_pronoun} dies, the title will be lost.
